def minimize_f_sum(a, b, mod=998244354):
    n = len(a)
    b = sorted(b, reverse=True)
    f = [(n - i) * (i + 1) * a[i] for i in range(n)]
    f = sorted(f)
    ans = 0
    for i in range(n):
        ans += f[i] * b[i] % mod
        ans = ans % mod
    return ans
